title: Krauthamer on NA and image of Gopher John- pattern

content.question: Based on Source 1, which of the following statements best describes the relationship between Indigenous nations such as the Seminoles and African Americans?

choices.label: African Americans were solely used for their labor and skills within Indigenous communities.
African Americans sought to establish dominance over Indigenous communities.
African Americansâ€™ relationship with Indigenous communities was severed after the Trail of Tears.
African Americans were often welcomed within Indigenous communities as equals.

content.answer: African Americans were often welcomed within Indigenous communities as equals.

skill.text: 1.C: Identify and explain patterns, connections, or other relationships (causation, changes, continuities, comparison).
